item.title: playersInNaziZombiesRoom
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

Hello ive been trying to make a Nazi Zombie Minigame and yes my base is 317.
Well, everytime I want to make the waiting room say how many players there are, it gives me 0 players everytime i go there.
this is the only stuff i added:
Client.java:
sendQuest(“Players:”, 15898);
sendQuest(""+PlayerHandler.playersInNaziZombiesRoom+"", 15899);
PlayerHandler.java:
public static int playersInNaziZombiesRoom = 0;

		if(NaziWaitTimer == 0){
		NaziWaitTimer = 1000;
		}
                    playersInNaziZombiesRoom = 0;

Thats all i guess, please help

Read full topic
